monster.name: Criosphinx
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Inscrutable
trait.text: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The sphinx makes a ram attack and two claw attacks.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Ram Attack
legendary.text: The sphinx makes one ram attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The manticore makes two attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The serpopard has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
trait.text: If the serpopard moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the serpopard can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
